articles.description: Follow live BBC radio plus text and score updates as Aston Villa host Fulham plus more in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Aston Villa vs Fulham - score, radio & updates

articles.description: Follow live text and score updates from across 12 matches on the final day of the Championship with the title, play-off places and relegation to be decided.
articles.title: EFL Championship LIVE: Build-up to 12 matches - live text

articles.description: Watch live action and follow updates from the 2025 World Snooker Championship at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025 LIVE: Judd Trump vs Mark Williams - watch semi-final stream, scores, results and updates

articles.description: Two-time Olympic 100m medallist Fred Kerley is arrested in Miami for allegedly punching former partner Alaysha Johnson, according to police.
articles.title: Fred Kerley arrested in Miami for allegedly punching ex-girlfriend Alaysha Johnson

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC local radio commentaries from day two in the latest round of the County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Day two - scores, radio commentary & live text

articles.description: Andrea Kimi Antonelli takes his first Formula 1 pole position for the sprint race at the Miami Grand Prix.
articles.title: Miami Grand Prix: Andrea Kimi Antonelli becames youngest driver to take F1 pole in sprint race

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says he will take a break from management after he leaves Manchester City, though he does not know when he will retire.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola to take coaching break when time at Manchester City ends

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at the relegation, play-off and title permutations for the final day of the Championship season on Saturday.
articles.title: Championship: Who needs what on the final day?

articles.description: Ryan Garcia suffers a points loss to fellow American Rolando Romero at New York's iconic Times Square, scuppering a planned rematch with Devin Haney.
articles.title: Garcia vs Romero: Shock Ryan Garcia loss scuppers Devin Haney rematch

articles.description: The Houston Rockets beat the Golden State Warriors 115-107 to level their NBA play-offs series at 3-3 and set up a decisive game seven.
articles.title: NBA: Houston Rockets level play-offs series 3-3 against Golden State Warriors to set up game seven
